SELECT DISTINCT xxx.* FROM (SELECT b.id AS "kin.id", b.username AS "kin.username", b.sex AS "kin.sex", b.age AS "kin.age", COUNT(b.hepa_b_code) AS "vacciCount", substr(b.hepa_b_code,14) AS "kin.hepaBCode", a.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", a.batch AS "batch", a.standard AS "standard", a.create_name AS "createName", a.vaccine_num AS "vaccineNum", a.signature AS "signature", a.vacctype AS "vaccType" FROM bs_hepatitis_b_num a LEFT JOIN bs_hepatitis_bcheckin b ON b.id = a.check_id and b.localcode = a.localcode LEFT JOIN SYS_USER su ON su."ID" = a.create_by
and a.localcode = #{localCode}
AND a.manufacturer = #{manufacturer}

AND a.status = '1'

AND a.create_date between to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')

AND a.create_date between to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND a.w_status = '0' AND a.deflag = '0'
GROUP BY b.id, b.username, b.sex, b.age , b.hepa_b_code, a.manufacturer, a.batch, a.standard, a.create_name, a.vaccine_num, a.signature, a.vacctype ) XXX

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bs_hepatitis_b_num( id, check_id, vaccine_num, vaccine_date, real_date, create_by, create_date, dose, pay_status, vaccine_id, standard, batch, manufacturer, create_name, signature, w_status, n_status, pid, vacctype, localcode, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{checkId}, #{vaccineNum}, #{vaccineDate}, #{realDate}, #{createBy.id}, sysdate, #{dose}, #{payStatus}, #{vaccineId}, #{standard}, #{batch}, #{manufacturer}, #{createBy.loginName}, #{signature}, #{wStatus}, #{nStatus}, #{pid}, #{vaccType}, #{localCode}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bs_hepatitis_b_num SET check_id = #{checkId}, vaccine_num = #{vaccineNum}, vaccine_date = #{vaccineDate}, real_date = #{realDate}, dose = #{dose}, vaccine_id = #{vaccineId}, standard = #{standard}, batch = #{batch}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, create_name = #{createBy.loginName}, signature = #{signature}, w_status = #{wStatus}, n_status = #{nStatus}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = sysdate, pid = #{pid}, vacctype = #{vaccType}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.vaccineid AS "vaccineid", a.batchno AS "batchno", a.dosage AS "dosage", a.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", a.isforeign AS "isforeign", a.storenum AS "storenum", a.sellprice AS "sellprice", a.isshow AS "isshow", bv.name AS "name", bv.name AS "vaccName", a.vacc_exp_date AS "vaccExpDate", A .codeall AS "codeall", A .specification AS "specification", A .code AS "code" FROM bs_manage_product a LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE bv ON bv.id = a.vaccineid WHERE a.id = #{pid} AND a.DEL_FLAG = '0'
